Project

Br4ss Lifestyle Brand
Web Development & Marketing Creatives

Quality. Comfort. Fit. Style.

BR4SS was a content driven brand that designed and marketed "Premium Men's Essentials" including underwear, socks & cologne for self-confident millennial customers of substance and style.

What I Worked On

BR4SS came to me wanting to completely redesign the look of their website to a more premium, luxurious feel, instead of the streetwear style they had previously tried to push. We collaborated to build a responsive, custom-themed, eCommerce website using WordPress and WooCommerce. Re-designing the site drove web traffic up 20% month over month. I was also responsible for creating web and print materials used for social media marketing, clothing manufacturing, and distributor acquisition.

Technologies Used

  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator
  • InDesign
  • git
  • WordPress

Some of the work I performed for BR4SS is unavailable to the public due to its sensitive nature.
